alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Brunswick; Caroline; Cumberland; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg; Nottoway; Powhatan; Prince Edward; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond); Western King William; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 17 at 11:24AM EST until November 18 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE PIEDMONT AND PORTIONS OF CENTRAL VIRGINIA The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 048 Fluvanna, Fire Weather Zone 060 Prince Edward, Fire Weather Zone 061 Cumberland, Fire Weather Zone 062 Goochland, Fire Weather Zone 064 Caroline, Fire Weather Zone 065 Mecklenburg, Fire Weather Zone 066 Lunenburg, Fire Weather Zone 067 Nottoway, Fire Weather Zone 068 Amelia, Fire Weather Zone 069 Powhatan, Fire Weather Zone 079 Brunswick, Fire Weather Zone 080 Dinwiddie, Fire Weather Zone 509 Western Louisa, Fire Weather Zone 510 Eastern Louisa, Fire Weather Zone 511 Western Hanover, Fire Weather Zone 512 Eastern Hanover, Fire Weather Zone 513 Western Chesterfield, Fire Weather Zone 514 Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights), Fire Weather Zone 515 Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond), Fire Weather Zone 516 Eastern Henrico and Fire Weather Zone 517 Western King William. * TIMING...Saturday morning and through the afternoon. * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. Some gusts to near 30 mph possible especially in the morning. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 65 degrees. * IMPACTS...Dry and breezy conditions will support adverse fire behavior allowing fires to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
